properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: preserveLayers
properties.description: Should layers be Preserve when the document is converted (default: true)

properties.name: preserveImageMaps
properties.description: Should image maps be preserved when the document is converted (default: true)

properties.name: preserveSlices
properties.description: Should slices be preserved when the document is converted (default: true)

properties.name: preserveHiddenLayers
properties.description: Should hidden layers be preserved when the document is converted (default: false)

name: OpenOptionsPhotoshop
description: Options which are applied when opening or placing a Photoshop file.
